meta.job_title: Associate, Call Center Agent - Outbound Call Center

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform appropriate sales activities as established by the Outbound Call Center Manager.
Evaluate insurance needs, make recommendations, complete applications, and facilitate policy delivery and referrals.
Achieve established sales activity metrics, primarily through outbound calls to policyholders and other lead sources.
Adhere to risk and compliance standards, including call center standards, and quality control.
Provide excellent customer service and adhere to quality and productivity standards, deadlines, and proper procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent GED required
Resident state life insurance license required
